title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4624 - Financial Statement Of Games Of Chance Operations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4624 - Financial Statement Of Games Of Chance Operations

§ 4624.2 - Cash control report

§ 4624.5 - Statements delinquently filed
§ 4624.6 - Statements defectively filed

§ 4624.8 - Special games of chance, raffle and bell jar account
§ 4624.9 - Method of withdrawal
§ 4624.10 - Purposes of withdrawal
§ 5624.11 - Direct disbursement from interest account prohibited
§ 4624.12 - Commingling prohibited
§ 4624.13 - Bookkeeping system required
§ 4624.14 - Books and records available for examination
§ 4624.15 - Financial report to membership

§ 4624.19 - Time for filing lessor financial statement

§ 4624.21 - Lawful expenditures

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 4624

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§101, 104[1], [19], 128; Executive Law, art. 19-B, § 435; General Municipal Law, arts. 9-A, 14-H, §§ 186, 188-a, 190-a; L. 1976, ch. 960
